item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Storage_Group_Partition
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Storage_Group_Partition Datatype Description A storage group partition container used for a hardware server order. This object describes the partitions for a single storage group that can be added to an order container. Local isGrow Is this a grow partition Type: boolean name The name of this partition Type: string size The size of this partition Type: decimal
